Text:
Another day, and the soft sound of the waves catches
the pale glow of the horizon, gently ushering the
fresh sea breeze to the beach.

That's right, just like when you saw the ocean spread
as far as the eye can see during your first
visit to the this town, when you learned of the
serene natural beauty overlooking the lively people.

Like when the lapping blue waters soothed your heart
for no reason in particular, leaving your mind free
and open.
This is Grazheim, the city of trade.

An island where summer never ends, where your heart
dances to the rich rumble of the waves, the wind
whispering through the trees, and the song of gulls
in the sky.
Mistsugoshi presents...Splash Marina.

Beaches for going out, leisure for days in.
Allow us to navigate your stay on the island—
Ciao! Novem Silva here! It's time for Splash Marina's March matinée!

In this info program, your intrepid Mitsugoshi
influencer will fill you in on all the latest trends
in Grazheim, the city of trade!

You can view this program at six locations around the
city in day and evening showings, with two updates
each month!

Now, let's have a look at the can't-miss trends for
March!

Oh. My. Gosh. Get this! The Grazheim Beach Tuna King
now has an exclusive Midgar root beer!

Made with tons of herbs and natural remedies straight
from Midgar, this fizzy delight pairs perfectly with
the shop's other exclusive, the Real Tuna Burger!

I recommend adding a huuuuge scoop of vanilla ice
cream! It is, seriously, the BEST thing ever!

Soak up the sound of the waves with a root beer float
in hand to make those boujee beachside vibes even
more lit!
B-Boujee beachside vibes...? Lit...?!

I think I get what she's trying to say... This is
certainly in line with Iota's way of doing things.

Even so, this is too over the top... Perhaps I should
ask Beta to write the product introductions, too.

Oh, and here I was thinking it's fine as-is. It makes
for a fun little ad that'll get tourists in the
spirit, no?

Well, yes, you're correct there, but we at Mitsugoshi
have our dignity to consider!

This endeavor is optimal for expanding into resort
locales, I doubt continuing with these "vibes" is
best for—
Gammyyyyy!!!
Ciao! What's the haps, Gammy?
Oh, I've been very well, thank you, but—
Please, stop calling me "Gammy"!
...Why?
"Why"? "WHY"?! Are you serious?

I mean, it's not like there's anybody else around to
hear, right? I totally get all that stuff.

And I'd be sure to call you "Luna" if anybody was
around.
We're counting on you today, Iota.

Yes, ma'am! You can leave it to me, Lady Alpha. I
shall be your guide around the sites of the trade city.

Now hold on, Iota! Why don't you address me with that
same level of respect?!

Well...were we not best friends forever since before
you became Luna the CEO?

We were, yes, but our relationship as superior and
subordinate takes precedence!

Heehee, it's been a while since I saw the two of you
going at it like this.
Lady Alpha?!

Now then, Iota, let's get down to business. I'd like
to hear your report.

Understood! By request of Lady Eta, I conducted an
investigation of potential sites for purchase in
Grazheim as investments.

I proceeded cautiously in my selection, adhering to
the letter of what had been asked of me. You will
find my investigation of the paperwork equally
flawless.

Well, I'm glad to hear you're taking your work so
seriously. So, what sort of sites did you find?
Wow, you really wanna know, Gammy?

Of course I do! That's why I came all the way here!
And please, stop calling me "Gammy"!
Huhhh...?!
...Aha, I got it! How about "Gamms"?
Pfft...

How is that any different?! You're completely missing
the point!!!
